> <snip>
> >DR is 2H slashing
> <snip>

> Anyone on this list use a weapon other than a 2HS? How
> does it compare to damage done by MOBS at higher level?
> Is it good as a solo adventurer?

I used a fs 2H sword from level 1 - 20, then I used demon claw and chitin
shield from 20 - 28, used Reaver from 29 - 34, and use Fleshripper from 35+.
I plan on getting a Mithril 2H (21 40, haste) in the future (45ish) and I'm
36 now. I used a friend's zweihander off and on during my 20s, and I
*always* did better using the claw/shield combo (mostly solo'ing). The 1HS
was good then and only then, during the period before you get to the really
high-powered 2HS weapons. Also, it may not hold for all 1HS, it may have
been that the claw/chitin-shield just worked wonders together, I dunno. I
have no plans of ever again using 1HS.

Dravith Vandre'i
Dark Elven SK (36)
Fennin Ro
